EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Forrester Report on Reducing Risk and Improving Security through Automation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We invite you to read Forrester’s Reduce Risk And Improve Security Through Infrastructure Automation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/reduce-risk-and-improve-security-through-infrastructure-automation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=email-forrester-reduce-risk-q318]]> report.
According to Forrester, today's security initiatives are impossible to execute manually. As infrastructure-as-code (IaC), edge computing, and internet-of-things (IoT) solutions proliferate, organizations must leverage automation to protect their business technology strategies. It can be tempting to continue the I&O and security and risk processes that have seemingly worked for years...but doing so puts your business and customers at severe risk. Automation is a profoundly effective movement that will revolutionize I&O professionals' work. Read this report and learn how infrastructure and operations (I&O) and security professionals can deliver efficient risk management and compliance throughout the entire solution stack — with unprecedented speed, agility, and dependability.
View the report <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/reduce-risk-and-improve-security-through-infrastructure-automation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=email-forrester-reduce-risk-q318]]> and stay current with the latest on Infrastructure Automation Security.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
